instruction: Add FAISS memory loading to quote_agent.py
code_diff:
diff --git a/agents/quote_agent.py b/agents/quote_agent.py
index 89ab23..cde345 100644
--- a/agents/quote_agent.py
+++ b/agents/quote_agent.py
@@ import statements @@
+from memory.faiss_wrapper import load_vectorstore

@@ def run_quote_agent(): @@
+    memory = load_vectorstore()
     agent = QuoteAgent(memory=memory)
     return agent.run()

instruction: Refactor hardcoded prices into a pricing config dictionary
code_diff:
diff --git a/utils/price_calc.py b/utils/price_calc.py
index a12bc3..d43e65 100644
--- a/utils/price_calc.py
+++ b/utils/price_calc.py
@@ def calculate_price(job_type): @@
-    if job_type == 'window_single': return 120
-    elif job_type == 'window_double': return 180
+    PRICES = {'window_single': 120, 'window_double': 180}
+    return PRICES.get(job_type, 0)

diff --git a/Dockerfile b/Dockerfile
index 332aaf..ddbe34 100644
--- a/Dockerfile
+++ b/Dockerfile
@@ final lines @@
+HEALTHCHECK CMD curl --fail http://localhost:8000/health || exit 1

instruction: Replace print statements with logging in job_agent.py
code_diff:
diff --git a/agents/job_agent.py b/agents/job_agent.py
index 93cbff..02dca1 100644
--- a/agents/job_agent.py
+++ b/agents/job_agent.py
@@ import statements @@
+import logging

@@ print("Starting job...") @@
-print("Starting job...")
+logging.info("Starting job...")
